message.content:
cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.LG 

This paper is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-category of cs.CL (Computation and Language) as it deals with natural language generation and dialogue systems. It is also likely to belong to cs.CV (Computer Vision) as it involves processing and understanding visual information from videos. Additionally, it may belong to cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) as it involves developing a system that can generate informative and fluent responses. It may also belong to cs.MM (Multimedia) as it involves processing and integrating multiple modalities such as text and video. Finally, it may belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning) as it involves using a multi-task learning method to learn joint representations among different modalities.
